name: Super Tower Defence
description:
How to play: Click the shop (black box with white to open it and select an affordable tower to buy it and click again to place it down on the map. Upgrade and Sell affect the next selected tower. Hit the play button to start the next wave. Select a tower to show its range. To use abilities, you must select the tower with the ability, wait for the appropriate ability icon to start blinking, then press the keyboard key on the bottom right corner of the icon to use it. Select a tower and press Z to change its Target Priority. Upgrade Parts are worth $10 but can only be spent on upgrades. Super Tower Defence is a tower defense game that is focused on complexity and depth. There are many synergies that you will discover when playing this game, and each tower does something different. There are many challenges that you can complete, both imposed by the game and you, the player. There are many types of enemies, 7 difficulties, difficulty modifiers, and different maps. There is also no unlock system so that challenges are available to everyone. Enjoy playing!

Map Difficulty Key:

Bronze = Beginner

Silver = Intermediate

Gold = Advanced

Blue = EXPERT!! (Don't try unless you have played Advanced maps, these are a big step up)
